welcome.data: Warm-Up Prompt: “What do you think is the difference between using a . (dot) or # (hash) in CSS? What might be some advantages of grouping selectors?” Students share their thoughts.

aim.data: Set the agenda and objective: Learn class and ID selectors, grouping, and chaining in CSS.

review.data: Connect to prior learning on basic selectors and CSS linking methods.

relevant.data: Mini-lecture and live demo in WebStorm: class vs. ID, grouping selectors, chaining selectors with examples.

interactive.data: Students build a profile card using class, ID, grouped, and chained selectors.

ownership.data: Students customize their cards with styles and hover effects using chaining.

resonate.data: Students reflect on class vs. ID and chaining through a short written response.

supplies.data: Computers with WebStorm, GitHub accounts, project folder, instructor slides/demo file.
